Posts.Content: May 18, 2014 04:57PM annamom1301 wrote: My father called and told me that my cancer is causing my mom's anxiety (which is causing her to fall, break her leg, end up in the hospital, to the nursing home...lather, rinse repeat).  I was told not to talk about it.  I am sure it has nothing to do with my sister also passing from stage iv lymphoma and my mom falling two days after the one year anniversary of my sister's passing.  Yep...my fault. I not only chose breast cancer but chose stage iv too. I'm only 43 and my sister was 46 when she passed. You can't pick your family...fortunately I have some very wonderful, supportive friends.
